ComicInfo.Title: Shattered Grid
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the Rangers deal with the fallout of Rita’s sinister plan and Matthew’s startling return, a new threat emerges with a shocking connection to Lord Drakkon.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dan Mora | 1 | B | Ranger Cover B | Miguel Mercado | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Audrey Mok (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure.
